summary: Implemented phased beauty module updates: fixed retail order payload to send items; added payment gateway selectors to booking, checkout, and retail flows with callback handling; added wallet transactions page filtered for beauty. Built dashboard overview with upcoming bookings/stats, enhanced booking list filters/sorting/status tab. Improved cancel/reschedule UX with reason modal, 24h guard, fee warning, notes. Added gift card purchase flow and navigation. Refactored booking form into multi-step with stepper. Added location filters to salon search. Enhanced loyalty campaigns with salon filter and pagination, package list service filter. Wired reviews page and monthly top-rated salons page. Added conversation composer with attachments and polling, real-time polling for conversations, and notifications page placeholder using new API call.
current_status: All planned todos marked complete; new pages/components added across beauty module. Lints clean.
